page.title: Home
page.content:
Welcome to Sailing Canyon Lake! Our goal is to help you enjoy sailing. We are here at the lake for your convenience.

Thinking of buying a boat? Rent our boats first so you can make a wise decision.

Visiting Canyon Lake? We'll meet you at the lake with one of our boats all rigged and ready to sail.

Need to fix your sail? We offer canvas and sail repair.

See you at the lake!
